mapper.select: select sy.id as id, yg.bh as bh, yg.xm as xm, case zt when '1' then '正常' when '2' then '结束' when '3' then '延期' when '4' then '不录用' else '未知' end as zt, sy.ksrq as ksrq, sy.jsrq as jsrq from sy join yg on sy.ygid = yg.id where sy.id = #{id}
select sy.id as id, yg.bh as bh, yg.xm as xm, sy.zt as zt, sy.ksrq as ksrq, sy.jsrq as jsrq from sy join yg on sy.ygid = yg.id where sy.id = #{id}

select sy.id as id, yg.bh as bh, yg.xm as xm, case zt when '1' then '正常' when '2' then '结束' when '3' then '延期' when '4' then '不录用' else '未知' end as zt, sy.ksrq as ksrq, sy.jsrq as jsrq from sy join yg on sy.ygid = yg.id order by sy.ksrq desc limit #{start}, #{length}
